name: Fink
description: The full world of Unix Open Source software for Darwin. A little outdated.

name: Homebrew
description: The missing package manager for OS X. The most popular choice.

name: MacPorts
description: Compile, install and upgrade either command-line, X11 or Aqua based open-source software. Very clean, it's what I use.

name: iTerm2
description: A better Terminal.app.

name: Homepage
description: The default shell for OS X and most other Unix-based operating systems.

name: Bash-it
description: Community Bash framework, like Oh My Zsh for Bash.

name: Homepage
description: A smart and user-friendly command line

name: Fisherman
description: A blazing fast, modern plugin manager for Fish.

name: The Fishshell Framework
description: Provides core infrastructure to allow you to install packages which extend or modify the look of your shell.

name: Installation & Configuration Tutorial
description: How to Setup Fish Shell with Fisherman, Powerline Fonts, iTerm2 and Budspencer Theme on OS X.

name: Homepage
description: Zsh is a shell designed for interactive use, although it is also a powerful scripting language.

name: Oh My Zsh
description: An open source, community-driven framework for managing your Zsh configuration.

name: Prezto
description: A speedy Zsh framework. Enriches the command line interface environment with sane defaults, aliases, functions, auto completion, and prompt themes.

name: zgen
description: Another open source framework for managing your zsh configuration. Zgen will load oh-my-zsh compatible plugins and themes and has the advantage of both being faster and automatically cloning any plugins used in your configuration for you.

name: Anonymous Pro
description: A family of four fixed-width fonts designed with coding in mind.

name: Codeface
description: A gallery and repository of monospaced fonts for developers.

name: DejaVu Sans Mono
description: A font family based on the Vera Fonts.

name: Hack
description: Hack is hand groomed and optically balanced to be your go-to code face.

name: Inconsolata
description: A monospace font, designed for code listings and the like.

name: Input
description: A flexible system of fonts designed specifically for code.

name: Meslo
description: Customized version of Apple's Menlo font.

name: Operator Mono
description: A surprisingly usable alternative take on a monospace font (commercial).

name: Powerline Fonts
description: Repo of patched fonts for the Powerline plugin.

name: Source Code Pro
description: A monospaced font family for user interfaces and coding environments.
